title: Trigger Implementation Details
body_html:
Trigger Implementation Details

Strategy

  • Subscribe to TxCUD events for relevant classes (Issue, Project, Comment, Attachment)
  • Map Create/Update/Delete to event types
  • Inspect TxUpdateDoc.operations for specific change types (status/assignee/priority)

Filtering

  • Evaluate filters against built doc or changed fields
  • Use hierarchy checks for class derivation

Output

  • Create WebhookEvent Tx with payload, deliveryId, status='pending'
  • Schedule delivery via queue or background task
